Potato_leaf_late_blight_00002.jpg.text: The leaf is green with a somewhat wavy texture. There is a noticeable brownish spot or lesion on the upper left side of the leaf, which is roughly circular in shape and has a lighter color compared to the surrounding leaf tissue. The leaf has a serrated edge, and the petiole appears to be thin and green.
